p: The total number of detected cases tended to increase from 2010 to 2015 in Guangxi ( Fig 1). Meanwhile, the number of EV71-positive cases showed a wave-like distribution, with large oscillations occurring between years with large or small epidemics. Unexpectedly, the EV71-positive rate tended to decrease over the period of 2010â€“2015 ( Fig 1). In general, there was an increase in the number of cases compared to the baseline from March to November.
